original: rgod par gyur na mi rtag pa yid la bya bas rab tu zhi bar bya'o //
analyzed: rgod par gyur na mi rtag pa yid la bya bas rab tu zhi bar bya'o //
translated: If he is excited, he should calm himself by bringing to mind the idea of impermanence.

original: gnyi ga'i gnyen po'i don du ni /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i gnyen po'i don du ni /
translated: For the purpose of the remedy for both,

original: 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dran par bya ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dran par bya ste /
translated: he should recall the verse spoken by the noble Rāṣṭrapāla:

original: sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che //
translated: The Buddha, the benefactor of the world, the Great Sage,

original: bskal pa bye mang brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bskal pa bye mang brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: appears only once in a very long time, after many hundreds of thousands of eons.

original: da lta dal ba dam pa rnyed pa la //
analyzed: da lta dal ba dam pa rnyed pa la //
translated: Now that I have found this excellent opportunity,

original: gal te @114b thar 'dod bag med spong bar gyis //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te @114b thar 'dod bag med spong bar gyis // zhes gsungs so //
translated: If you want to be free, give up carelessness.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And again:

original: 'di ni sgyu ma lta bur bden pa min //
analyzed: 'di ni sgyu ma lta bur bden pa min //
translated: This is not true, like an illusion.

original: 'dus byas rmi lam mtshungs par brtags nas ni //
analyzed: 'dus byas rmi lam mtshungs par brtags nas ni //
translated: Having examined compounded things, like a dream,

original: 'di ni rtag tu sdug pa thams cad dang // myur du 'bral bar mi 'gyur gang yang med //
analyzed: 'di ni rtag tu sdug pa thams cad dang // myur du 'bral bar mi 'gyur gang yang med //
translated: There is nothing that will not quickly be separated from all that is dear.🔽Always be diligent and strive

original: pha rol phyin dang stobs rnams la //
analyzed: pha rol phyin dang stobs rnams la //
translated: In the perfections and the powers.

original: rtag tu brtson bar gyis la 'bad par gyis //
analyzed: rtag tu brtson bar gyis la 'bad par gyis //
translated: Never let your diligence decline

original: rdul med byang chub sangs rgyas ma gyur par //🔽brtson 'grus nams kyang nyams par gyur ta re //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rdul med byang chub sangs rgyas ma gyur par // brtson 'grus nams kyang nyams par gyur ta re // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Until you attain the dustless enlightenment of buddhahood.

original: 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa'i mdo las kyang /
translated: And in the noble extensive sutra, the Lalitavistara, it says:

original: srid gsum rga dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'bar //
analyzed: srid gsum rga dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'bar //
translated: The three worlds are ablaze with the suffering of old age and sickness.

original: 'di ni 'chi med rab 'bar mgon med pa ;
analyzed: 'di ni 'chi med rab 'bar mgon med pa ;
translated: This is the blazing of immortality, the helpless

original: / srid las 'byung la 'gro ba rtag tu rmongs //
analyzed: / srid las 'byung la 'gro ba rtag tu rmongs //
translated: One, always confused about how to escape from existence,

original: bum par chud pa'i bung ba 'khor ba bzhin //
analyzed: bum par chud pa'i bung ba 'khor ba bzhin //
translated: Like a bee caught in a jar.

original: srid gsum mi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra //
analyzed: srid gsum mi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra //
translated: The three worlds are as transient as an autumn cloud.

original: 'gro ba'i skye 'chi gar la lta dang mtshungs //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i skye 'chi gar la lta dang mtshungs //
translated: The birth and death of beings is like watching a play.

original: 'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste //
translated: The passing of beings’ lives is like a flash of lightning in the sky.

original: ri gzar 'bab chu lta bur myur mgyogs 'gro //
analyzed: ri gzar 'bab chu lta bur myur mgyogs 'gro //
translated: It goes quickly, like a waterfall on a steep mountain.

original: srid sred ma rig dbang gis skye bo rnams //🔽mi dang lha gnas ngan song lam gsum po //
analyzed: srid sred ma rig dbang gis skye bo rnams // mi dang lha gnas ngan song lam gsum po //
translated: Through the power of craving for existence and ignorance,🔽Beings circle in the five realms of beings:

original: 'gro ba lnga po dag tu mi mkhas 'khor //
analyzed: 'gro ba lnga po dag tu mi mkhas 'khor //
translated: The human realm, the god realm, and the three lower realms.

original: dper na rdza mkhan 'phang lo 'khor ba bzhin //
analyzed: dper na rdza mkhan 'phang lo 'khor ba bzhin //
translated: They circle like a potter’s wheel.🔽Always attached to the most beautiful forms, the most pleasant sounds,

original: rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang // dri zhis ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa //
analyzed: rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang // dri zhis ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa //
translated: The most delicious smells, the most delicious tastes, and the most delightful touches,

original: dus ngan rnyil 'gro ba 'di dag thogs //
analyzed: dus ngan rnyil 'gro ba 'di dag thogs //
translated: Beings are caught by the noose of the lower realms.

original: dper na rngon pa'i rnyi la spre'u thogs bzhin //
analyzed: dper na rngon pa'i rnyi la spre'u thogs bzhin //
translated: They are like a monkey caught in a hunter’s trap.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan mya ngan gnod pa mang //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan mya ngan gnod pa mang //
translated: The qualities of desire are a source of suffering and harm.

original: 'jigs bcas rtag tu dgra byed nyon mongs bcas //
analyzed: 'jigs bcas rtag tu dgra byed nyon mongs bcas //
translated: They are always dangerous, creating enemies, and accompanied by afflictions.

original: ral gri'i sa 'dra dug sdong lo ma mtshungs //
analyzed: ral gri'i sa 'dra dug sdong lo ma mtshungs //
translated: They are like a sword’s edge or a poisonous tree’s leaves.

original: ngan skyags snod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bos spangs //
analyzed: ngan skyags snod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bos spangs //
translated: Noble beings reject them as they would a vessel of vomit.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan 'jigs bcas nyon mongs bcas //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan 'jigs bcas nyon mongs bcas //
translated: The pleasures of the senses are dangerous and defiling.

original: rtag tu dran pa brjed byed mun pa byed //
analyzed: rtag tu dran pa brjed byed mun pa byed //
translated: They are always the cause of forgetfulness and darkness.

original: rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed sdug bsngal rtsa //
analyzed: rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed sdug bsngal rtsa //
translated: They are always the cause of fear and the root of suffering.

original: srid pa'i sred pa'i 'khri shing 'phel bar byed //🔽ji ltar me 'bar 'obs nas 'jigs bcas pa //
analyzed: srid pa'i sred pa'i 'khri shing 'phel bar byed // ji ltar me 'bar 'obs nas 'jigs bcas pa //
translated: They increase the vines of craving for existence.🔽Noble beings know that the pleasures of the senses are like a pit of fire,

original: de ltar 'dod 'di 'phags pa'i skye bos rig /'dam rdzab che 'dra ral gri gshegs gnas 'dra //
analyzed: de ltar 'dod 'di 'phags pa'i skye bos rig /'dam rdzab che 'dra ral gri gshegs gnas 'dra //
translated: like a great swamp, like a place filled with swords,

original: ral gri'i so la sbrang rtsis bskus dang mtshungs //
analyzed: ral gri'i so la sbrang rtsis bskus dang mtshungs //
translated: like a sword’s edge smeared with honey,

original: ji ltar sbrul gyi mgo dang ngan skyugs snod //
analyzed: ji ltar sbrul gyi mgo dang ngan skyugs snod //
translated: like the head of a snake, like a vessel of vomit.🔽The wise know that the pleasures of the senses are like a piece of meat, like a stake,

original: de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig / bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra //
analyzed: de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig / bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra //
translated: like a butcher’s knife and chopping block, like a trap, like a rope,🔽like a pit, like a dream, like borrowed ornaments,🔽like fruit on a tree, like a weapon, like a fire,

original: rol khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yis //
analyzed: rol khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yis //
translated: like a flash flood, like a robbery, like a prison,🔽like a public servant, like a ghost, like a demon,🔽like a fruit pit, like a thorn, like a snake,🔽like a murder, like a flash fire, like a dream.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra //
translated: The pleasures of the senses are like a moon in water,🔽like a reflection, like an echo,

original: gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag ca 'dra ba dang// @115a * //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag ca 'dra ba dang// @115a * //
translated: like a mirage, like a dream, like a flash of lightning.

original: mig yor 'dra zhing gar la lta 'dra dang // rmi lam mnyam par 'phags pa'i skyo bos rig /'dod pa'i yon tan skad cig ya ma brla //
analyzed: mig yor 'dra zhing gar la lta 'dra dang // rmi lam mnyam par 'phags pa'i skyo bos rig /'dod pa'i yon tan skad cig ya ma brla //
translated: The noble ones know that the objects of desire are like a mirage, a show, a dream,

original: sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa can //
analyzed: sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa can //
translated: like an illusion, a hallucination, false,

original: chu bur dbu ba lta bur yang dag min //
analyzed: chu bur dbu ba lta bur yang dag min //
translated: like a water bubble, foam on water, unreal,

original: yongs su brtags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs //
analyzed: yongs su brtags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs //
translated: and arising from conceptualization.

original: na tshod thog mar gzugs mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe //
analyzed: na tshod thog mar gzugs mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe //
translated: When one is young, in the prime of one’s life, with a beautiful body,

original: phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod //
analyzed: phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod //
translated: to desire and to love is the behavior of a fool.

original: rgan sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom nas //
analyzed: rgan sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom nas //
translated: When one is old, suffering, and the body is broken,

original: rnam par spangs te ri dags klung skam bzhin //
analyzed: rnam par spangs te ri dags klung skam bzhin //
translated: one abandons it, like an animal leaves a dried-up river.

original: nor 'bru dam pa rdzas mang stobs ldan tshe //
analyzed: nor 'bru dam pa rdzas mang stobs ldan tshe //
translated: When one is rich, with abundant wealth and grain,

original: phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod //
analyzed: phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod //
translated: to desire and to love is the behavior of a fool.

original: nor nyams sdug bsngal bar ni gyur pa'i tshe //
analyzed: nor nyams sdug bsngal bar ni gyur pa'i tshe //
translated: When one’s wealth is lost and one is in misery,

original: rnam par spangs te mi yis 'phrog stong bzhin //
analyzed: rnam par spangs te mi yis 'phrog stong bzhin //
translated: one abandons it, like a man who is robbed and left empty-handed.

original: ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing //
analyzed: ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing //
translated: Just as a tree with flowers and fruit

original: de ltar sbyin 'dod mi la dga' bar byed //
analyzed: de ltar sbyin 'dod mi la dga' bar byed //
translated: So people who want to give are happy.

original: nor nyams rga bas nyen cing spong byed pa //
analyzed: nor nyams rga bas nyen cing spong byed pa //
translated: But when their wealth is lost, they are attacked by old age and abandon it,

original: de dag dga' bar mi 'gyur bya rgod bzhin //
analyzed: de dag dga' bar mi 'gyur bya rgod bzhin //
translated: like a crow, they are not happy.

original: rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshe dpon po bzhin //
analyzed: rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshe dpon po bzhin //
translated: When they have wealth and a beautiful body, they are like a king,

original: phrad na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed //
analyzed: phrad na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed //
translated: pleasing to the eye, and delighting the senses.

original: rgan sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad pa //
analyzed: rgan sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad pa //
translated: But when they are old, suffering, and their wealth is gone,

original: de tshe 'dod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin //
analyzed: de tshe 'dod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin //
translated: they are not desired, like the Lord of Death.

original: rga bas rga byas na tshod yal gyur na //
analyzed: rga bas rga byas na tshod yal gyur na //
translated: When old age comes, youth is gone,

original: sdong po gnam lcags kyi ni bcom pa bzhin //
analyzed: sdong po gnam lcags kyi ni bcom pa bzhin //
translated: like a tree struck by lightning.

original: rga bas 'khogs na 'jigs bcas khang rul 'dra //
analyzed: rga bas 'khogs na 'jigs bcas khang rul 'dra //
translated: When old age comes, it is like a crumbling house, full of fear.

original: rga las 'byung ba thub pa myur du smros //
analyzed: rga las 'byung ba thub pa myur du smros //
translated: Quickly tell me, Sage, how to escape from old age.

original: bud med skyes pa'i tshogs rnams rga bas skyems //
analyzed: bud med skyes pa'i tshogs rnams rga bas skyems //
translated: Old age withers the masses of men and women,

original: 'khri shing s'a la'i nags la rlung dmar bzhin //
analyzed: 'khri shing s'a la'i nags la rlung dmar bzhin //
translated: like a great wind withers a forest of shala trees.

original: rga bas brtson 'grus rtsal dang shugs 'phrog ste //
analyzed: rga bas brtson 'grus rtsal dang shugs 'phrog ste //
translated: Old age robs one of the strength of youth,

original: dper na skyes bu 'dam du bying ba bzhin //
analyzed: dper na skyes bu 'dam du bying ba bzhin //
translated: like a man sinking in a swamp.

original: rga bas gzugs sdug gzugs ni mi sdug byed //🔽rga bas gzi brjid 'phrog cing mthu stobs 'phrog / rga bas bde ba 'phrog cing brnyas par byed //
analyzed: rga bas gzugs sdug gzugs ni mi sdug byed // rga bas gzi brjid 'phrog cing mthu stobs 'phrog / rga bas bde ba 'phrog cing brnyas par byed //
translated: Aging makes a beautiful form ugly.🔽Aging robs one of one’s splendor and strength,🔽aging robs one of one’s happiness and makes one contemptible.

original: rga bas 'chi byed rga bas mdangs kyang 'phrog / nad brgya mang dang nad 'thibs sdug bsngal gyis //🔽'gro ba gces te mi yis ri dags bzhin //
analyzed: rga bas 'chi byed rga bas mdangs kyang 'phrog / nad brgya mang dang nad 'thibs sdug bsngal gyis // 'gro ba gces te mi yis ri dags bzhin //
translated: Aging brings death and robs one of one’s radiance.

original: rga dang na bas bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la //
analyzed: rga dang na bas bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la //
translated: Look at the world, oppressed by aging and sickness,

original: sdug bsngal gyis ni 'byung ba myur shod cig //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyis ni 'byung ba myur shod cig //
translated: quickly tell me of the suffering of the many hundreds of diseases and the suffering of the masses of illnesses.

original: dper na dgun smad rlung dang kha ba che //
analyzed: dper na dgun smad rlung dang kha ba che //
translated: Just as in the late winter, the wind and heavy snow🔽rob the trees, bushes, and medicinal plants of their splendor,

original: rtsi shing gel pa nags sman mdangs kyang 'phrog / de ltar nad 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrog cing //
analyzed: rtsi shing gel pa nags sman mdangs kyang 'phrog / de ltar nad 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrog cing //
translated: so this disease robs the world of its radiance

original: dbang po gzugs dang stobs ni nyams par byed //
analyzed: dbang po gzugs dang stobs ni nyams par byed //
translated: and weakens the senses, form, and strength.

original: nor 'bru nor chen tha mar zad par byed //
analyzed: nor 'bru nor chen tha mar zad par byed //
translated: It brings great wealth of grain and riches to an end.

original: nad ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas par byed //
analyzed: nad ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas par byed //
translated: Disease always makes the world contemptible.

original: gnod pa byed cing sdug la @115b sdang bar byed //
analyzed: gnod pa byed cing sdug la @115b sdang bar byed //
translated: It causes harm and makes the beloved hateful.

original: yongs su gdung byed ma ba  las nyi ma bzhin //
analyzed: yongs su gdung byed ma ba  las nyi ma bzhin //
translated: Like the sun rising from behind a cloud.

original: 'chi dang 'pho dang 'chi 'pho dus byed pa //
analyzed: 'chi dang 'pho dang 'chi 'pho dus byed pa //
translated: Death, transmigration, and the end of life

original: phangs shing sdug pa'i skye bo rtag tu 'bral //
analyzed: phangs shing sdug pa'i skye bo rtag tu 'bral //
translated: Always separate you from what you love.

original: phyir mi 'ong zhing phrad par 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong zhing phrad par 'gyur ma yin //
translated: You will not return, and you will not meet again.

original: shing las lo 'brul 'dra zhing rlung rgyun mtshungs //
analyzed: shing las lo 'brul 'dra zhing rlung rgyun mtshungs //
translated: Like leaves on a tree, like the current of a river,

original: 'chi ba dbang yod bdag dbang med byed //
analyzed: 'chi ba dbang yod bdag dbang med byed //
translated: Death is powerful, and you have no power.

original: 'chi bas 'phrog byed chu bos shing ded bzhin //
analyzed: 'chi bas 'phrog byed chu bos shing ded bzhin //
translated: Death carries you away like a river sweeping away a sleeping town.

original: mi ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pur 'gro //
analyzed: mi ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pur 'gro //
translated: You go alone, without a companion, without a second.

original: rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang med //
analyzed: rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang med //
translated: You have no power, for you will get the fruits of your own actions.

original: 'chi bas srog chags brgya phrag mang 'dzin te //
analyzed: 'chi bas srog chags brgya phrag mang 'dzin te //
translated: Death seizes many hundreds of living beings,

original: 'byung po'i tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu srin bzhin //🔽kra la mkha' lding glang chen seng ge 'dra //
analyzed: 'byung po'i tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu srin bzhin // kra la mkha' lding glang chen seng ge 'dra //
translated: Like a sea monster in the ocean seizes many creatures.🔽Like a garuḍa snatches away an elephant or a lion,

original: rtsa rtsi 'byung po'i tshogs la me dang mtshungs //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rtsa rtsi 'byung po'i tshogs la me dang mtshungs // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Like a fire burns a forest.

original: rgyal po la gdams pa'i mdo las kyang //
analyzed: rgyal po la gdams pa'i mdo las kyang //
translated: It also says, in the Advice to a King Sūtra:

original: rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na phyogs bzhi nas ri chen po sra ba //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na phyogs bzhi nas ri chen po sra ba //
translated: Your Majesty, it is like this: Suppose there were four great mountains coming from the four directions,🔽hard,

original: brtan pa / snying po dang ldan pa /🔽ma zhig pa /🔽ma gas pa /
analyzed: brtan pa / snying po dang ldan pa / ma zhig pa / ma gas pa /
translated: solid,🔽unbroken,

original: 'phan med pa /
analyzed: 'phan med pa /
translated: without cracks,

original: shin tu mkhregs pa gcig tu stug po bzhi /🔽gnam la reg cing sa zlog ste /

analyzed: mnar med pa dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su lo mang po lo brgya phrag mang po lo brgya stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal chen po sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag pa rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste /
translated: and that he will experience great suffering, unbearable, intense, violent suffering, and unpleasant sensations in the hells for many years, many hundreds of years, many thousands of years,

original: ji srid du sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du zad cing byang bar ma gyur pa de srid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid du sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du zad cing byang bar ma gyur pa de srid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: until all of the non-virtuous actions that he has done and accumulated will be exhausted.

original: de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba mthong bar gyur na /
analyzed: de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba mthong bar gyur na /
translated: He sees that he will be born in the animal realm,🔽and that he will experience great suffering, unbearable, intense, violent suffering, and unpleasant sensations in the animal realm for many years, many hundreds of years, many thousands of years,🔽until all of the non-virtuous actions that he has done and accumulated will be exhausted.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du nya rlon dang nya rlon mid la sogs pa srog chags gcig gis gcig gsod pa dang 'tshe ba dang dbang med par skye'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du nya rlon dang nya rlon mid la sogs pa srog chags gcig gis gcig gsod pa dang 'tshe ba dang dbang med par skye'o //
translated: In the great ocean, fish swallow fish, and so on. Beings are born there helplessly, killing and harming each other.

original: bdag yi dags kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ram snyam na /
analyzed: bdag yi dags kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ram snyam na /
translated: “ ‘I wonder if I will be born among the hungry ghosts?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: lo mang po dang lo brgya phrag mang po dang lo brgya stong phrag mang por chu'i sgra yang mi thos na mthong ba lta ci smos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lo mang po dang lo brgya phrag mang po dang lo brgya stong phrag mang por chu'i sgra yang mi thos na mthong ba lta ci smos par 'gyur ro //
translated: For many years, many hundreds of years, many thousands of years, they do not even hear the word “water,” let alone see it.

original: rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis mi rtag par blta zhing zad pa dang dengs par blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis mi rtag par blta zhing zad pa dang dengs par blta bar bya ste /
translated: “ ‘Therefore, Your Majesty, you should view things as impermanent, view them as subject to destruction and disappearance,

original: 'chi bas 'jigs skrag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'chi bas 'jigs skrag par bya'o //
translated: and be afraid of death.

original: chos kyis rgyal srid kyis shig / chos ma yin pas ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyis rgyal srid kyis shig / chos ma yin pas ni mi bya'o //
translated: You should rule the country in accordance with the Dharma, not in a way that is contrary to the Dharma.

original: khyod chos dang mthun par gyis shig / chos ma yin pa dang mthun @117b par ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: khyod chos dang mthun par gyis shig / chos ma yin pa dang mthun @117b par ni mi bya'o //
translated: You should act in accordance with the Dharma, not in a way that is contrary to the Dharma.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rgyal po chen po khyod kyi lus 'di /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po khyod kyi lus 'di /
translated: Your Majesty, this body of yours,

original: 'di ltar legs par yongs su bsrungs legs par yongs su btsas pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar legs par yongs su bsrungs legs par yongs su btsas pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: even though it is so well protected and well served, will still experience death.

original: yon tan thams cad dang ldan zhing shin tu yun ring por bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang myang ba dang ngoms par 'gyur ba bsod pa dang gtsang ma mang pos tshim par byas te bskyed bskyed pa yang tha ma'i mal na 'dug pa'i tshe /
analyzed: yon tan thams cad dang ldan zhing shin tu yun ring por bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang myang ba dang ngoms par 'gyur ba bsod pa dang gtsang ma mang pos tshim par byas te bskyed bskyed pa yang tha ma'i mal na 'dug pa'i tshe /
translated: Even though you have been satisfied for a very long time with many good, wholesome foods and drinks, and have been nourished with all good qualities, when you are lying on your final bed,

original: sman pas bor zhing sman dang kha zas dang bza' ba dang thug pas kyang kles la bor nas bkres pa dang skom pas nyen cing yid mi bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sman pas bor zhing sman dang kha zas dang bza' ba dang thug pas kyang kles la bor nas bkres pa dang skom pas nyen cing yid mi bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: abandoned by the physicians, and abandoned by food and drink, you will die in pain, hunger, and thirst, and with an unhappy mind.

original: rgyal po chen po 'di ltar khyod kyis lus bkrus shing bskus te bdug pas bsgos me tog dri zhim pos bsgos kyang /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po 'di ltar khyod kyis lus bkrus shing bskus te bdug pas bsgos me tog dri zhim pos bsgos kyang /
translated: Your Majesty, even though you have bathed and anointed your body with ointments and perfumed it with fragrant flowers,

original: gdon mi za bar 'chi ba'i dus su rang bzhin gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dri nga ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar 'chi ba'i dus su rang bzhin gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dri nga ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When the time of death comes, the natural, innate stench will emerge.

original: rgyal po chen po 'di ltar gos yul ka shi pa'i ras dang / srin bal dang / du gu la dang / dar dang / 'dab ma dang / bal dang / gso ras la sogs pa'i gos kyi bye brag gis g-yogs kyang tha ma'i mal na 'dug pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po 'di ltar gos yul ka shi pa'i ras dang / srin bal dang / du gu la dang / dar dang / 'dab ma dang / bal dang / gso ras la sogs pa'i gos kyi bye brag gis g-yogs kyang tha ma'i mal na 'dug pa'i tshe /
translated: Great King, even though you are covered with the finest clothes from Kāśi, cotton, silk, wool, linen, and so on,

original: snum rnam pa mang po dang chus reg cing gos dri ma can gon zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snum rnam pa mang po dang chus reg cing gos dri ma can gon zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: when you are lying on your final bed, you will die wearing dirty clothes, your body smeared with various oils and water.

original: rgyal po chen po khyod de ltar bud med kyi nang na 'dug btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug ste /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po khyod de ltar bud med kyi nang na 'dug btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug ste /
translated: Great King, you are surrounded by women, in the midst of your harem.

original: bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor zhing gar dang glu dang rol mo dang sil snyan byed /
analyzed: bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor zhing gar dang glu dang rol mo dang sil snyan byed /
translated: You are surrounded by a group of women, and they sing, dance, play music, and play percussion instruments.

original: pheg rdob pi bang dang gling bu len /
analyzed: pheg rdob pi bang dang gling bu len /
translated: They play the lute and flute.

original: rnga rdung zhing yid bde bar rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa yang 'chi bas 'jigs skrag nas shin tu yid me bde zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnga rdung zhing yid bde bar rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa yang 'chi bas 'jigs skrag nas shin tu yid me bde zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will beat drums and play musical instruments, and they will enjoy themselves and make love. But when they are frightened by the fear of death, they will not be happy at all, and they will die.

original: rgyal po chen po 'di ltar khyod kyi khyim gyi nang na spos dri zhim po'i bskubs  ni bskus /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po 'di ltar khyod kyi khyim gyi nang na spos dri zhim po'i bskubs  ni bskus /
translated: “Great King, in this way, in your house, the incense burners are filled with fragrant incense,

original: gtan pa ni bcug / skar khung ni legs par bcad /
analyzed: gtan pa ni bcug / skar khung ni legs par bcad /
translated: the windows are closed,

original: byug pa mang pos ni byugs /
analyzed: byug pa mang pos ni byugs /
translated: it is anointed with many ointments,

original: 'bru mar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i mar me ni 'bar /
analyzed: 'bru mar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i mar me ni 'bar /
translated: the lamps are burning with fragrant oil,

original: dar gyi lnga ldi mang po ni bres /
analyzed: dar gyi lnga ldi mang po ni bres /
translated: many silk tassels are hanging,

original: me tog dri zhim po'i sil ma mang pas ni chal bar bkram /
analyzed: me tog dri zhim po'i sil ma mang pas ni chal bar bkram /
translated: many fragrant flowers are scattered about,

original: pog phor nas ni bdugs /
analyzed: pog phor nas ni bdugs /
translated: incense is burning in censers,

original: khri'i rtsa ba gser dang dngul dang bee d'u rya las ni byas /
analyzed: khri'i rtsa ba gser dang dngul dang bee d'u rya las ni byas /
translated: and the base of the throne is made of gold, silver, and beryl.

original: pa ti ka dang / dre'u rdog gi stan dang / stan nang tshangs can dang / za 'og gi stan dang / yul ka ling ka'i stan dang / steng du gding ba dang / de'i steng du gding bas ni bkab /
analyzed: pa ti ka dang / dre'u rdog gi stan dang / stan nang tshangs can dang / za 'og gi stan dang / yul ka ling ka'i stan dang / steng du gding ba dang / de'i steng du gding bas ni bkab /
translated: a paṭikā, a donkey-load, a mattress with cotton wool inside, a silk mattress, a mattress from Kaliṅga, a mattress spread on top, and a mattress spread on top of that.

original: @118a * // g-yas g-yon du dar mang po'i sngas ni bzhag pa'i khri la nyal ba yang bya rog dang bya rgod dang / wa dang / ro dang / sha dang / rus pa dang / skra dang / khrag dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang rnag gi gnas mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba'i dur khrod chen por bor nas lus g-yo ba med cing sa la nyal du gdon mi za'o //
analyzed: @118a * // g-yas g-yon du dar mang po'i sngas ni bzhag pa'i khri la nyal ba yang bya rog dang bya rgod dang / wa dang / ro dang / sha dang / rus pa dang / skra dang / khrag dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang rnag gi gnas mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba'i dur khrod chen por bor nas lus g-yo ba med cing sa la nyal du gdon mi za'o //
translated: You will be laid out on a bed with pillows of many silks on the right and left, and then, without a doubt, you will be thrown into a great terrifying charnel ground, a place of corpses, flesh, bones, hair, blood, fat, lymph, and pus, where your body will be motionless and you will lie on the ground.

original: rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang khyod glang po che'i bya la kha'am rta'i rgyab bam shing rta la zhon te /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang khyod glang po che'i bya la kha'am rta'i rgyab bam shing rta la zhon te /
translated: Great King, it is like this: You may ride an elephant, a horse, or a chariot,

original: dung dang rnga dang rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / rol mo'i sil snyan gyi bye brag len pa dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan ni bsgreng /
analyzed: dung dang rnga dang rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / rol mo'i sil snyan gyi bye brag len pa dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan ni bsgreng /
translated: He is followed by a procession of conch shells, drums, clay drums, kettledrums, and various kinds of musical instruments, as well as parasols, victory banners, flags, and banners of victory.

original: bsil yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / rnga yab dang shing t'a la las byas pa ni g-yob cing /
analyzed: bsil yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / rnga yab dang shing t'a la las byas pa ni g-yob cing /
translated: He is fanned by yak-tail whisks with jeweled handles, and by palm leaves and palm trees.

original: glang po che dang rta pa dang dpung bu chung du ma ni phyi bzhin 'brang /
analyzed: glang po che dang rta pa dang dpung bu chung du ma ni phyi bzhin 'brang /
translated: He is followed by many elephants, cavalry, and infantry.

original: rgyal bu dang bram zes bslab pa phog pa'i blon po dang mdun na 'don pa dang skye bo thal mo sbyar ba brgya stong du mas ni phyag bya zhing rgyal bar spyon cig rgyal bar spyon cig ces snyan pa brjod de phyir 'byung myong ba yang ring por
analyzed: rgyal bu dang bram zes bslab pa phog pa'i blon po dang mdun na 'don pa dang skye bo thal mo sbyar ba brgya stong du mas ni phyag bya zhing rgyal bar spyon cig rgyal bar spyon cig ces snyan pa brjod de phyir 'byung myong ba yang ring por
translated: He is greeted by many hundreds of thousands of people with palms pressed together, who say, ‘Welcome, welcome!’🔽But before long, he will be dead, lying on his bed, motionless,

original: mi thogs par g-yo ba med cing mal du shi nas mi bzhis bteg ste /
analyzed: mi thogs par g-yo ba med cing mal du shi nas mi bzhis bteg ste /
translated: and carried out by four men.

original: pha dang ma dang phu nu dang sring mo dang chung ma dang bu pho dang bu mo dang / bran pho dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / chal za ba dang ; blon po dang / grong khyer ba'i skye bo dag mya ngan gyi dbang du song ste /
analyzed: pha dang ma dang phu nu dang sring mo dang chung ma dang bu pho dang bu mo dang / bran pho dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / chal za ba dang ; blon po dang / grong khyer ba'i skye bo dag mya ngan gyi dbang du song ste /
translated: His father, mother, brothers, sisters, wife, sons, daughters, male and female servants, workers, hired hands, neighbors, and friends were overcome with grief.

original: lag pa bteg nas brang rdung zhing mchog tu snying rje bar /
analyzed: lag pa bteg nas brang rdung zhing mchog tu snying rje bar /
translated: They raised their arms and beat their breasts, crying out in the most piteous way:

original: kyi hud bu kyi hud mgon po kyi hud phu bo kyi hud jo bo zhes ngu zhing /
analyzed: kyi hud bu kyi hud mgon po kyi hud phu bo kyi hud jo bo zhes ngu zhing /
translated: “Alas, son! Alas, protector! Alas, brother! Alas, lord!”

original: zham 'bring ba dang grong khyer pa'i skye bo dag gis 'jigs pa dang bcas par mthong ste /
analyzed: zham 'bring ba dang grong khyer pa'i skye bo dag gis 'jigs pa dang bcas par mthong ste /
translated: The people of the city, seeing this, were also frightened.

original: grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas /🔽sa'i 'og tu bcug gam /
analyzed: grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas / sa'i 'og tu bcug gam /
translated: They took the body out of the southern gate of the city🔽and buried it in the ground.

original: 'brog dgon par sa'i nang du bcug kyang /
analyzed: 'brog dgon par sa'i nang du bcug kyang /
translated: Or they took it to a charnel ground and buried it there.

original: bya rog dang bya rgod dang wa la sogs pas zos shing /
analyzed: bya rog dang bya rgod dang wa la sogs pas zos shing /
translated: But it was eaten by crows, vultures, wolves, and so on.

original: rus pa de dag mes bsregs sam chur bskyur ram sa'i 'og tu bcug kyang rlung dang nyi ma dang char pas phye mar byas te /
analyzed: rus pa de dag mes bsregs sam chur bskyur ram sa'i 'og tu bcug kyang rlung dang nyi ma dang char pas phye mar byas te /
translated: Whether those bones are burned by fire, thrown in water, or buried in the ground, they are ground to powder by the wind, sun, and rain.

original: phyogs phyogs su gtor zhing de nyid du rul par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs phyogs su gtor zhing de nyid du rul par 'gyur ro //
translated: Scattered in all directions, they rot right there.

original: rgyal po chen po de ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang 'di bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po de ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang 'di bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: Great King, the bodies of all sentient beings are like this.

original: rgyal po chen po 'du byed thams cad ni de ltar mi rtag pa de ltar mi brtan pa zhes rgya cher gsungs so //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po 'du byed thams cad ni de ltar mi rtag pa de ltar mi brtan pa zhes rgya cher gsungs so //
translated: Great King, all compositional things are like this, impermanent, unstable.

original: de la nyon mongs pa ni gtsor 'dod chags dang zhe @118b sdang dang gti mug rnams te /
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa ni gtsor 'dod chags dang zhe @118b sdang dang gti mug rnams te /
translated: The afflictions are primarily attachment, aversion, and delusion.

original: de dag gi nang nas gang la mchog tu gnod par byed pa'i gnyen po gang yin pa de thog mar bsgom zhing de'i gzhi yang yongs su spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi nang nas gang la mchog tu gnod par byed pa'i gnyen po gang yin pa de thog mar bsgom zhing de'i gzhi yang yongs su spang bar bya'o //
translated: Among them, you should first cultivate the antidote that is most harmful, and you should completely abandon its object.

original: de la re zhig 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las /
analyzed: de la re zhig 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las /
translated: In this regard, the noble Cloud of Jewels says:

original: de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la brten cing 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spang ngo //
analyzed: de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la brten cing 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spang ngo //
translated: One should rely on the antidotes to desire and completely avoid the conditions that give rise to desire.

original: 'dod chags kyi gnyen po de ni gang /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi gnyen po de ni gang /
translated: What are the antidotes to desire?

original: 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen de dag ni gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen de dag ni gang zhe na /
translated: What are the conditions that give rise to desire?

original: mi sdug pa bsgom pa ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o //
analyzed: mi sdug pa bsgom pa ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o //
translated: The cultivation of the unattractive is the antidote to desire.

original: yul gyi bzang mo ni 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen no //
analyzed: yul gyi bzang mo ni 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen no //
translated: A beautiful woman is a condition for the arising of desire.

original: mi sdug pa bsgom pa de yang gang zhi na /
analyzed: mi sdug pa bsgom pa de yang gang zhi na /
translated: What is the cultivation of the unattractive?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: lus 'di la skra dang spu dang sen mo dang so dang rdul dang / dri ma dang / pags pa dang sha dang rus pa dang rgyus pa dang rtsa dang mkhal ma dang snying dang mchin pa dang glo ba dang rgyu ma dang gnye ma dang pho ba dang sul mngas dang long ka dang mcher pa dang phyi sa dang mchil ma dang rdul dang snabs
analyzed: lus 'di la skra dang spu dang sen mo dang so dang rdul dang / dri ma dang / pags pa dang sha dang rus pa dang rgyus pa dang rtsa dang mkhal ma dang snying dang mchin pa dang glo ba dang rgyu ma dang gnye ma dang pho ba dang sul mngas dang long ka dang mcher pa dang phyi sa dang mchil ma dang rdul dang snabs
translated: In this body there are head hairs, body hairs, nails, teeth, dirt and impurities, skin, flesh, sinews, bones, bone marrow, kidney, heart, liver, lungs, intestines, mesentery, undigested food, feces, tears, sweat, mucus, phlegm, pus, blood, fat, lumps of grease, saliva, bile, and urine.

original: dang ngar snabs dang zhag dang chu ser dang rkang dang tshil dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang rnag dang khrag dang klad pa dang klad rgyas dang gcin dag yod de /
analyzed: dang ngar snabs dang zhag dang chu ser dang rkang dang tshil dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang rnag dang khrag dang klad pa dang klad rgyas dang gcin dag yod de /
translated: There are feces, urine, bile, phlegm, pus, blood, rheum, grease, marrow, fat, lymph, and brain and spinal matter.

original: dngos po de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te /
analyzed: dngos po de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te /
translated: The bodhisattva who is naturally inclined to investigate these things

original: yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can de 'di snyam du byis pa blun po mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa de yang dngos po 'di dag shes nas 'dod chags kyi sems mi skye na shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam ste
analyzed: yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can de 'di snyam du byis pa blun po mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa de yang dngos po 'di dag shes nas 'dod chags kyi sems mi skye na shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam ste
translated: thinks, “Even a foolish, confused, ignorant, and unskillful person would not arouse a desirous mind if he knew these things. What need is there to speak of someone who is naturally inclined to wisdom?”

original: / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa mang du bsgom pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa mang du bsgom pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva cultivates the meditation on the impurity of the body extensively.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma las kyang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma las kyang /
translated: The Blessed Lady also says,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: Moreover, Śāriputra, a bodhisattva great being who practices the perfection of wisdom

original: lus 'di yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: lus 'di yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows this body as it really is.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ba lang gi shan pa'am ba lang gi shan pa'i slob mas ba lang bsad de gri rnon pos bag bzhir gshegs nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste so sor rtog go //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ba lang gi shan pa'am ba lang gi shan pa'i slob mas ba lang bsad de gri rnon pos bag bzhir gshegs nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste so sor rtog go //
translated: “Subhūti, it is just as when a butcher or a butcher’s apprentice kills a cow and, standing or sitting down, examines it with a sharp knife.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na yang /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na yang /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: lus 'di la yod pa ni sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams so zhes lus 'di la khams kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go zhes bya ba nas /🔽@119a * // de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: lus 'di la yod pa ni sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams so zhes lus 'di la khams kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go zhes bya ba nas / @119a * // de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: examine this body with its elements as it really is, thinking, ‘In this body there are the earth element, the water element, the fire element, and the wind element.’🔽…

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is just as when a butcher or a butcher’s apprentice kills a cow and, standing or sitting down, examines it with a sharp knife.

original: chun pa'i rdzas /
analyzed: chun pa'i rdzas /
translated: a butcher’s equipment

analyzed: 'bras s'a lu dang / 'bru dang / til dang / 'bras dang / mon sran sde'u dang / mon sran gre'u dang / nas dang / gro dang / sran chung dang / yungs kar dang / 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba de dag la /
translated: and filled with various grains, such as rice, wheat, sesame, beans, peas, lentils, barley, oats, mustard seed, and white mustard seed.🔽If a person with eyes

analyzed: skyes bu mig dang ldan pas brtags na / 'di ltar 'di dag ni 'bras s'a lu'o // 'di dag ni 'bru'o //

analyzed: 'di dag ni til lo // 'di dag ni 'bras so // 'di dag ni mon sran sde'u'o //

analyzed: 'di dag ni mon sran sde'u'o // 'di dag ni nas so // 'di dag ni gro'o //
translated: these are barley grains,🔽these are oats,

original: 'di dag ni sran chung ngo //
analyzed: 'di dag ni sran chung ngo //
translated: these are mustard seeds,

original: 'di dag ni yungs kar ro zhes bya bar shes so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni yungs kar ro zhes bya bar shes so //
translated: and these are white mustard seeds.’

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: are practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: lus 'di la rkang mthil yan chad klad rgyas man chad sen mo dang spu dang pags pa la thug pa mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba ste /
analyzed: lus 'di la rkang mthil yan chad klad rgyas man chad sen mo dang spu dang pags pa la thug pa mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba ste /
translated: This body, from the soles of the feet upwards and from the hair and nails downwards, is full of various kinds of filth.

original: lus 'di la yod pa ni skra dang / spu dang klad pa dang klad rgyas dang mig gi rngu ma dang rna spabs kyi bar dag go zhes snga ma ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go //
analyzed: lus 'di la yod pa ni skra dang / spu dang klad pa dang klad rgyas dang mig gi rngu ma dang rna spabs kyi bar dag go zhes snga ma ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go //
translated: In this body there are head-hairs, body-hairs, nails, teeth, bone, skin, flesh, muscles, veins, arteries, heart, spleen, lungs, small intestines, large intestines, stomach, feces, liver, kidneys, head, head-membrane, tears, sweat, phlegm, pus, blood, fat, marrow, grease, saliva, mucus, urine, and brain.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In this way he carefully considers things as they are in reality.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod du song ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod du song ste /

original: dur khrod du bor ba ro'i gnas su bskyal ba shi nas zhag gcig lon pa'am /
analyzed: dur khrod du bor ba ro'i gnas su bskyal ba shi nas zhag gcig lon pa'am /

original: shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa'am /
analyzed: shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa'am /

original: shi nas zhag gsum lon pa'am /
analyzed: shi nas zhag gsum lon pa'am /

original: shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa'am /
analyzed: shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa'am /

analyzed: shi nas zhag lnga lon pa'am / rnam par bam pa'am / rnam par bsngos pa'am /
translated: or that has been dead for five days,🔽a bloated corpse,🔽a livid corpse,🔽a festering corpse,🔽or a corpse that has been eaten by worms,🔽or a corpse that has been burned,🔽or a corpse that has been cut up,🔽or a corpse that has been gnawed,

original: rnam par rnags pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par rnags pa'am /

original: rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i ro sna tshogs mthon na /
analyzed: rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i ro sna tshogs mthon na /
translated: He sees various corpses, eaten by worms,

original: de lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: de lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: and he applies this to his own body: “This body has such a nature,

original: de lta bu'i chos can no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos can no //

analyzed: chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di la yang de dang sbyor ro //

original: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /

original: de lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so //
analyzed: de lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so //
translated: dwells observing a body in the body.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on.

original: gzhan yang gang gi tshe shi ba'i ro dur khrod du bor ba /
analyzed: gzhan yang gang gi tshe shi ba'i ro dur khrod du bor ba /
translated: Furthermore, when he sees a corpse thrown into a charnel ground,

analyzed: shi nas zhag drug lon pa'am /

original: shi nas zhag bdun lon pa'am /
analyzed: shi nas zhag bdun lon pa'am /

translated: torn up by jackals,🔽eaten by various kinds of animals,

analyzed: de las gzhan pa srog chags rnam pa sna tshogs kyis za ba mthong na de @119b lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin can /

analyzed: de lta bu'i chos can no //
translated: This is the way the body is.

analyzed: gzhan yang gang gi tshe shi ba'i ro dur khrod du bor na /
translated: when he sees a corpse that has been thrown away in a charnel ground,

original: rnam par zos pa /
analyzed: rnam par zos pa /
translated: eaten by crows,

original: mi gtsang ba /
analyzed: mi gtsang ba /
translated: filthy,

original: dri nga ba mthong na /
analyzed: dri nga ba mthong na /
translated: and stinking,

analyzed: de lus 'di yang de dang sbyar ro zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no // gzhan yang gang gi tshe /

translated: he should apply it to this very body, as before.🔽Moreover, when he sees in the charnel ground a skeleton

analyzed: dur khrod na keng rus su gyur pa sha dang khrag dang chu rgyus med pa mthong na /

analyzed: 'dong mo yang gzhan na / sgal tshigs kyang gzhan na / rtsib ma yang gzhan na /
translated: the bones of the spine in another,🔽the bones of the ribs in another,

analyzed: mjing tshigs kyang gzhan na /
translated: the bones of the neck in another,

original: dpung pa'i rus pa yang gzhan na 'dug pa mthong na /🔽de lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no //🔽de lta bu'i chos can no //
analyzed: dpung pa'i rus pa yang gzhan na 'dug pa mthong na / de lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no // de lta bu'i chos can no //

original: chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di yang de dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di yang de dang sbyar ro //
translated: one should apply this to one’s own body, thinking, “This body also has such a nature,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: has such a condition,🔽and does not go beyond this law.”

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: “Subhūti, moreover, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: dur khrod na rus pa lo du ma lon pa rlung dang nya mas gdugs pa dkar ba dung lta bu mthong na /
analyzed: dur khrod na rus pa lo du ma lon pa rlung dang nya mas gdugs pa dkar ba dung lta bu mthong na /

original: de lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin no //
translated: This body is also of that nature.

original: de lta bu'i chos can no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos can no //
translated: It has that kind of nature.

original: chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di yang de dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di yang de dang sbyar ro //
translated: It does not go beyond this reality.

analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa na /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being who practices the perfection of wisdom

original: dur khrod rus pa lo du ma lon pa thi ba'i mdog ltar sngo ba sob sob por gyur pa zegs pa sa la rdul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par gyur pa mthong na /
analyzed: dur khrod rus pa lo du ma lon pa thi ba'i mdog ltar sngo ba sob sob por gyur pa zegs pa sa la rdul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par gyur pa mthong na /
translated: sees in the charnel ground bones that have been there for many years, blue like a magpie, crumbled to dust, equal to and the same as the earth’s dust.

original: de lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin no //
translated: This body is also of that nature.

original: de lta bu'i chos can no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos can no //
translated: It has that kind of nature.🔽It does not go beyond this reality.

original: chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhas lus 'di yang de dang sbyar ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhas lus 'di yang de dang sbyar ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: In this way, this body is also like that.

original: 'di ni re zhig 'dod chags la kun du spyod pa'i gnyen po mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni re zhig 'dod chags la kun du spyod pa'i gnyen po mdor bsdus pa'o //
translated: This is a brief antidote for someone who is indulging in attachment.

original: zhe sdang gi gnyen po ni byams pa dang mi sdug pa'i sems @120a * //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi gnyen po ni byams pa dang mi sdug pa'i sems @120a * //
translated: The antidote for aversion is loving kindness and the meditation on repulsiveness.

original: can mi mthong ba'am de dang lhan cig tu zas la sogs pa don gcig pas dga' ba skye'o //
analyzed: can mi mthong ba'am de dang lhan cig tu zas la sogs pa don gcig pas dga' ba skye'o //
translated: or one does not see the one who is suffering, or one is pleased because one has the same goal, such as food, etc.

original: de la gzhan la bde ba 'dod pa dang don du gnyer ba dang mos pa dang mngon par dga' ba ni byams pa ste /
analyzed: de la gzhan la bde ba 'dod pa dang don du gnyer ba dang mos pa dang mngon par dga' ba ni byams pa ste /
translated: Among them, the desire for the happiness of others, the pursuit of it, the inclination toward it, and the delight in it, is love.

original: 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang lan du phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu dag las nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i chags pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang lan du phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu dag las nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i chags pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is a non-addicted attachment, which is to say, it is not a cause of desire or of a return favor.

original: de ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: It is threefold:

original: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las /
analyzed: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las /
translated: The Akṣayamatisūtra says,

original: sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
translated: “The love of bodhisattvas who have newly set out in the vehicle is based on sentient beings.

original: chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
translated: The love of bodhisattvas who have entered the stages is based on the Dharma.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: The love of bodhisattvas who have attained patient acceptance of the nonproduction of things is non-apprehending. ”

original: yang sangs rgyas la dmigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la dmigs pa dang / sems can la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: yang sangs rgyas la dmigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la dmigs pa dang / sems can la dmigs pa'o //
translated: Again, it is focused on the Buddha, focused on the Bodhisattvas, focused on the Disciples and Solitary Buddhas, and focused on sentient beings.

original: de la sems can la dmigs pa ni gang thog mar snying du sdug pa'i sems can la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar bsgrub par bsam par goms par byed cing de dang mthun pa'i byams pa nye bar bsgrub po //
analyzed: de la sems can la dmigs pa ni gang thog mar snying du sdug pa'i sems can la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar bsgrub par bsam par goms par byed cing de dang mthun pa'i byams pa nye bar bsgrub po //
translated: Among these, that focused on sentient beings is that by which one first cultivates the thought of providing benefit and happiness to sentient beings who are dear, and one accomplishes the loving kindness that accords with that.

original: de'i 'og tu 'dres pa rnams la'o //🔽de'i 'og tu tha mal pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu 'dres pa rnams la'o // de'i 'og tu tha mal pa rnams la'o //
translated: After that, one does so with regard to those who are a mixture of the two.🔽After that, one does so with regard to ordinary people.

original: de'i 'og tu nye 'khor ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu nye 'khor ba rnams la'o //
translated: After that, one does so with regard to those in one’s neighborhood.

original: de'i 'og tu rang gi grong na gnas pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rang gi grong na gnas pa rnams la'o //
translated: After that, one does so with regard to those in one’s own country.

original: de bzhin du gzhan gyi grong pa nas phyogs gcig gi bar du mos par byas te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan gyi grong pa nas phyogs gcig gi bar du mos par byas te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so //
translated: In the same way, one should extend one’s devotion to those in other countries, up to all the directions, and abide having pervaded them, completed them.

original: phyogs bcur yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: phyogs bcur yang de bzhin no //
translated: And so it is with the ten directions.

original: sangs rgyas la sogs pa la dmigs pa la ni sbyor ba 'di med de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs pa la dmigs pa la ni sbyor ba 'di med de /
translated: But this is not the case for those who focus on the Buddha and so on.

original: de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba las /
analyzed: de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba las /
translated: The dedication in the Sūtra of the Diamond Victory Banner says:

original: de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
analyzed: de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
translated: When he practices bodhisattva activity,🔽whatever forms he sees, whether attractive or unattractive,

original: gzugs yid du 'ong ba'am yid du mi 'ong ba gang ji snyed cig mthong ba dang / de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos yid du 'ong ba'am /
analyzed: gzugs yid du 'ong ba'am yid du mi 'ong ba gang ji snyed cig mthong ba dang / de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos yid du 'ong ba'am /
translated: and likewise, whatever sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental objects he experiences, whether attractive or unattractive,

original: yid du mi 'ong ba'am kha na ma tho ba med pa dag la bde ba rgya che ba 'od gsal ba'am /
analyzed: yid du mi 'ong ba'am kha na ma tho ba med pa dag la bde ba rgya che ba 'od gsal ba'am /
translated: he experiences them with vast, bright happiness,

original: gang gis yid bde ba skye ba dang / bde ba bsgrub pa dang / dad pa skye pa dang / dga' ba 'byung ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba la gnas pa dang / mgu ba 'byung ba dang / @120b yid mi bde ba ldog pa dang /
analyzed: gang gis yid bde ba skye ba dang / bde ba bsgrub pa dang / dad pa skye pa dang / dga' ba 'byung ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba la gnas pa dang / mgu ba 'byung ba dang / @120b yid mi bde ba ldog pa dang /
translated: and he experiences the arising of mental pleasure, the attainment of happiness, the arising of faith, the arising of joy, the experience of supreme joy, the arising of satisfaction, and the cessation of mental dissatisfaction.

original: sems dge ba 'byung ba dang / sems las su rung bar 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa mnyen par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rab tu tshim par 'gyur ba'i bde pa de myong ba na /
